headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Implement security incident response plan
digest_items.why: Prepared response reduces damage and recovery time from breaches
digest_items.fix: Document procedures, assign roles, and conduct regular drills

digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx

digest_items.title: Implement disaster recovery plan
digest_items.why: Disasters and ransomware require tested recovery procedures
digest_items.fix: Document RTO/RPO, maintain offline backups, and test recovery quarterly

digest_items.title: Verify container image security
digest_items.why: Vulnerable base images introduce security risks to containerized apps
digest_items.fix: Scan images with Trivy or Clair and use minimal base images

digest_items.title: Implement zero trust architecture
digest_items.why: Zero trust assumes breach and verifies every access request
digest_items.fix: Require authentication for all resources regardless of network location

digest_items.title: Implement password complexity requirements
digest_items.why: Weak passwords are easily cracked by brute force attacks
digest_items.fix: Require minimum 12 characters with mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols

digest_items.title: Verify encryption in transit
digest_items.why: Unencrypted data transmission exposes sensitive information
digest_items.fix: Enforce HTTPS for all endpoints and use TLS for internal services
